name: CoLoop
headline: AI Copilot for insights & strategy
description: CoLoop is the AI copilot for insights and strategy. We help insights and strategy consultants complete their qualitative analysis in 30% of the time it would take with traditional tools and methods.

founders.name: Jack Bowen, Founder
founders.description: Materials engineering by trade - spent a masters year playing around with lasers looking for new hosts for qubits ü§ì. Now helping insights & strategy teams build decks in in 70% less time with AI.

founders.name: Adrien Wald, Founder
founders.description: Adrien loves to solve hard problems. He can be modeled as a function that takes caffeine as input and outputs (sometimes half-baked) product and engineering solutions. In a previous life, Adrien was a biochemist studying at Oxford. And in a life before that, a violinist for 13 years.

# The AI analysis copilot for Insights & Strategy
Add highly accurate domain specific AI to any qualitative research project in minutes and save days of time & thousands in cost
Over 200 insights & strategy teams run on CoLoop
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/kvhmtAiDrCsiRyJGKPr4o2dpu5k.png?scale-down-to=4096)

##### Works with everything you use already
## Centralise your research material in a bespoke AI
Upload your data from a growing range of file formats, languages and 3rd party tools. CoLoop automatically transforms, transcribes and translates your sources into a single unified structure.
[Book a demo](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
##### Works with everything you use already
## Centralise your research material in a bespoke AI
Upload your data from a growing range of file formats, languages and 3rd party tools. CoLoop automatically transforms, transcribes and translates your sources into a single unified structure.
[Book a demo](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
##### Works with everything you use already
## Centralise your research material in a bespoke AI
Upload your data from a growing range of file formats, languages and 3rd party tools. CoLoop automatically transforms, transcribes and translates your sources into a single unified structure.
[Book a demo](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
## Primary analysis reports up to 10x faster
##### Maximise efficiency with cutting-edge AI
Organised Research
### Generate primary analysis grids in seconds not days
Enter questions, objectives or prompts to create fully customisable primary analysis grids arranged by participant, segment or group.
Save days of time per project with fully cited sources and thematic overviews
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
Straight to the point
### Find and clip the perfect quotes instantly
Clip and download reels seamlessly from your transcripts. Select and clip pieces of audio or video into snippets ready for your deck or edit team.
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
Talk to your data
### Perfect memory of all your research material
Create Al chats that can answer questions about files, segments, tasks and activities. AI chats show their working and always link back to cited sources for full transparency.
No more hunting, Ctrl+F‚Äôing or head scratching.
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
Built for teams
### Invite your team and collaborate seamlessly
Invite, access manage and collaborate with your team in realtime. Share transcripts, Al chats and analysis grids. Reduce team meetings and never get out of sync again.
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
## The analysis is simple
##### Find out for yourself why our users love CoLoop
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
[Get Started](https://coloop.ai/<https:/webforms.pipedrive.com/f/ctoujU4c0WUSSp28fkRfnv2DG1qqkAyiBxwmxZAK3ZoDEdB31hUjqFJovhX30SqMwz>)
200+
CoLoop is trusted by 200+ leading consultancies
73%
73% of users say that CoLoop makes their job more efficient and easier
92%
Over 92% accurate on our multiple language and complex domains benchmark
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PcJCvknzB4cEI1ZO8LuZTqxFz40.png)
#### CoLoop has been a great help. The sweet spot for our team is complex projects with multiple moderators. It helps put order on the chaos of unstructured data, speeding up thematic analysis and helping us all relax about our approaching deadlines. Then as we create reports we can go back to the data to cross-reference and augment hypotheses. Recommended!
Director, Trinity McQueen
Simon Shaw

## Reliable, Trustworthy, Secure
##### You can put your faith in CoLoop
![Secure as standard](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BUEl2pIHE9VjkROJGahLl7Ke3U.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![Secure as standard](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BUEl2pIHE9VjkROJGahLl7Ke3U.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![Secure as standard](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BUEl2pIHE9VjkROJGahLl7Ke3U.png?scale-down-to=1024)
Secure as standard
### Protect your data while staying on top of your work
We are committed to the security and privacy of your data. Our Vanta Trust Centre connects you to our privacy, security and compliance programmes, so you have all of the information that you need to manage your data.
Don‚Äôt even trip
### Exceptional accuracy, allowing you to have peace of mind at all stages of your report
CoLoop‚Äôs analysis grids allow you to rapidly suggest, test and validate themes in seconds - with full traceability of quotes at all stages. We've developed proprietary search technology that's over 90%+ accurate across different languages and in complex domains like healthcare.
![Don't even trip](https://framerusercontent.com/images/q4Dk4aFuA8fmKxAwgfM6IQu9JRk.png?scale-down-to=1024)

## Primary analysis reports up to 10x faster
##### Maximise efficiency with cutting-edge AI
Organised Research
### Generate primary analysis grids in seconds not days
Enter questions, objectives or prompts to create fully customisable primary analysis grids arranged by participant, segment or group.
Save days of time per project with fully cited sources and thematic overviews

### Find and clip the perfect quotes instantly

Create Al chats that can answer questions about files, segments, tasks and activities. AI chats show their working and always link back to cited sources for full transparency.
No more hunting, Ctrl+F‚Äôing or head scratching.

generated_description:
CoLoop is an innovative company based in London, founded in 2020, and is part of Y Combinator's Batch S21. Its mission? To be the AI copilot for insights and strategy, transforming how consultants handle qualitative analysis. By using CoLoop, these professionals can complete their analysis in 30% of the time typically required by conventional methods.

With a small yet dynamic team of seven, CoLoop‚Äôs technology empowers over 200 insights and strategy teams to streamline their research processes. Essentially, CoLoop enables researchers to upload their data‚Äîbe it from various file formats or languages‚Äîand seamlessly convert it into a coherent, searchable structure. This means analysts can quickly generate primary analysis grids, clip meaningful quotes from transcripts, and create AI chats to answer questions about their research.

The results? A reported 73% of users find their work easier and more efficient, with the AI achieving over 92% accuracy across multiple languages and complex domains. This technology is particularly valuable for projects that involve unstructured data or multiple moderators.

Recently, CoLoop raised $3.5 million in funding, a testament to its promise and appeal in the market. With entities like Dalton Caldwell (a Group Partner at Y Combinator) backing them, the company is solidifying its place in the landscape of artificial intelligence, generative AI, and natural language processing.

Whether you‚Äôre looking to reduce the chaos in your data analysis process or simply want to save time and costs, CoLoop presents a compelling solution. Curious to dive deeper? You can explore their offerings at [CoLoop.ai](https://coloop.ai/).
